title: Provide LBHttpSolrServer based on Http Components in Solr 3.x
description:
With SOLR-2020 Solr 3.6 provides a HttpSolrServer based on Apache Http Components. But the LBHttpSolrServer still uses commons-httpclient. 

It would be cool if you could provide a loadbalancing implementation based on HttpComponents as well.

comments.author: Andreas Hubold
comments.content: With Solr 4 being released, this issue is now of lesser importance for us (the reporter of the issue).

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content:
As of 4.0, LBHttpSolrServer is implemented using org.apache.http.client.

3.x is now bug fix only, so no new LBHttpSolrServer implementation will be added to that branch.
